email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot inquiry for 12,000 MT of wheat from Vancouver to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel details?

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel GOLDEN HARVEST for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 250m. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42.50 seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the laycan dates and the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Michael,

The laycan dates are flexible, starting from October 1st to October 10th. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 41.00 per MT. Let me know if this meets your requirements.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

USD 41.00 sounds more reasonable. Please confirm the laycan dates and send over the recap. Also, could you provide the vessel's ETA to Vancouver?

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Wheat Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Confirmed. The laycan dates are October 1st to October 10th. The vessel's ETA to Vancouver is September 28th. I will send over the recap shortly.

Best,
Sarah
